name: OR_LOG_PNDS_DIA
description: The OR_LOG_PNDS_DIA table contains OR management system log PNDS diagnosis information.

columns.name: LOG_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the surgical log that the PNDS diagnoses refer to.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number of the PNDS diagnosis in the log.

columns.name: PNDS_DIAGNOSIS_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the PNDS diagnosis.

columns.name: PNDS_DIAGNOSIS_ID_ELEMENT_NAME
columns.description: The name of the PNDS record.

columns.name: PNDS_DIA_PRES_YN
columns.description: Yes/no flag indicating whether or not this diagnosis was present.

columns.name: PNDS_DIA_NOTES
columns.description: Free text comments about the diagnosis.

columns.name: PNDS_DIA_ADDED_YN
columns.description: Yes/no flag indicating whether or not this diagnosis was added by a user.
